product_overview: Kademe Kalite Yönetim Sistemi (Kademe QMS) is an integrated, enterprise-grade quality management platform designed for Kademe A.Ş. It provides centralized management of production quality, supplier quality, customer complaints, internal audits, and compliance with ISO 9001 and automotive industry standards through modular, data-driven tools and real-time reporting dashboards.
core_goals: Provide centralized quality management across all production, supply, and audit processes.
Enable full traceability with comprehensive history and document linkage for every record.
Deliver real-time dashboards and detailed PDF reports for monitoring key quality indices.
Support role and module-based access control to ensure data security and appropriate user permissions.
Offer responsive design for seamless mobile and tablet access to the platform.
key_features: Authentication via Supabase Auth with secure session management and protected routes.
Interactive Dashboard with statistics, charts, recent transactions, critical non-conformities, and AI-based root cause predictions.
KPI module for defining, tracking, and analyzing key performance indicators with trend visualizations.
DF-8D Non-Conformity management with stepwise 8D problem resolution and root cause analysis tools such as 5 Why, Ishikawa, and FTA.
Quality Cost tracking module calculating cost of poor quality and providing trend analysis and integration with other quality modules.
Customer Complaints handling with SLA tracking, action plans, and communication logs.
Supplier Quality management featuring supplier evaluation, non-conformity tracking, and PDF report integrations.
Internal Audit management for planning audits, recording findings, and generating reports.
Deviation and Quarantine management modules integrated with DF-8D processes.
Equipment and Calibration tracking with maintenance and calibration schedules.
Document management with uploading, versioning, and organized categorization.
Kanban-based Task Management with drag-and-drop functionality and project task filtering.
Modular sidebar navigation with access control per user roles and modules.
PDF report generation for multiple modules and dashboards using jsPDF and related libraries.
user_flow_summary: Login: Users enter credentials on the /login page, authenticate via Supabase, and are redirected to their target page or dashboard upon success.

Non-Conformity (NC) Creation: Users invoke a global NC form modal from any related module, complete required data including 8D steps and attachments, then save to the database and upload files to Supabase Storage.
PDF Reports: Users request PDF generation from detailed views or dashboards, which triggers jsPDF processes to produce downloadable or viewable reports in a new tab.
Access Control: The system validates user permissions based on role and module-level access data from Supabase tables or metadata and redirects unauthorized access with warnings.
Module Navigation: Users navigate via the sidebar menu which shows and enables modules based on their permission levels.
validation_criteria: Successful user authentication and session persistence with Supabase Auth on all protected routes.
Proper role-based and module-level access enforcement: no unauthorized data visibility or actions available.
Accurate functional operation of each key module including DF-8D workflows, KPI updates, and quality cost calculations.
PDF reports must generate accurately with correct data for dashboards, DF-8D records, internal audits, and customer complaints.
Responsive UI behavior validated across modern browsers and devices including mobile and tablet viewport sizes.
Security compliance through use of RLS policies in Supabase ensuring data is only accessible at the appropriate user scope.
File upload and storage functionalities for attachments correctly integrated with Supabase Storage and referenced properly in database records.
